displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.
displayProperties.name: Balanced Glide

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to enemies.
displayProperties.name: Fusion Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light that continuously damages enemies trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Solar Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that unleashes bolts of Solar Light at nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Firebolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: Weave Solar Light into blades and smite your foes from the skies.
displayProperties.name: Daybreak

displayProperties.description: Send out a spiral of three explosive Solar energy blasts.
displayProperties.name: Celestial Fire

displayProperties.description:
Fire weapons, send Celestial Fire, and throw grenades while gliding.

Airborne final blows extend the effects of Heat Rises and grant melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Winged Sun

displayProperties.description: Hold  to consume your grenade energy to  extend glide time and improve in-air accuracy.
displayProperties.name: Heat Rises

displayProperties.description: Activate while midair to dodge twice.
displayProperties.name: Icarus Dash

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to burn them and cause them to explode.
displayProperties.name: Igniting Touch

displayProperties.description: Daybreak projectiles seek targets as they travel and, upon impact, launch a streak of deadly flames.
displayProperties.name: Fated for the Flame

displayProperties.description: Killing an enemy with Daybreak extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Everlasting Fire

displayProperties.description: Activate while midair to quickly descend and restore your health. While Daybreak is active, descend causes explosive damage and returns Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Phoenix Dive

displayProperties.description: Thrust your Daybreak sword into the ground. The sword continuously projects a powerful aura that heals and empowers nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to inflict burn damage and empower yourself and nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Guiding Flame

displayProperties.description: Hold  to convert your grenade into a Blessing that heals ally targets and drops overshields you and your allies can pick up. Activate Divine Protection while Gliding to hover in mid-air.
displayProperties.name: Divine Protection

displayProperties.description: Healing or empowering allies regenerates your grenade, melee, and Rift energy.
displayProperties.name: Benevolent Dawn
